question: Q1. How can I join this mentorship programme?
answer:
It’s just three easy steps! Step 1 : Register yourself on the website. Create your account and choose your desired plan/subscription Step 2: Wait. Kick back and relax for a bit. Our mentors will contact you within 12 hours. We can’t keep our students waiting for long, can we? 
 Step 3: Embark on your journey. Once we have contacted you within 12 hours, you can connect to your mentor through chats and calls, and thus your journey with us and towards your goals begins

question: Q2. Can I change my mentor?
answer: Yes, absolutely! We at MIND are focused on a student-centric approach, and thus you control your mentorship. You can drop in requests, queries and/or complaints, and we’ll respond to them blazingly fast

question: Q3. Can I choose my mentor based on gender? Will my mentor solve my subject doubts as well? Will I get the same mentor, If I enroll again when my subscription ends?
answer: Yup, you can choose your mentor based on gender! Just fill your preferred options while registering yourself with us. Although doubt solving does not come under our subscriptions, you can contact +91 91259 99708 for personal tutoring sessions and for any help you want, By default, yes you can choose the same mentor when you enroll again. However, you can instead fill an option for mentor change if you want someone else . We at MIND let you, the student, be the center of it. Our philosophy is to let the students tailor their experience as they see fit.

question: Q4. Can I get a demo session?
answer: We usually do not offer anything kind of demo sessions. Reason, unlike others who only sugar coat giving their best only into demo sessions and forget everything about you once you connect them. We have strong believe that building a good relationship by offering a great mentorship by our trusted mentors can really help and improve you in a drastic way. We are trustful for our work and we promise you won't ever regret by connecting to us.For any query you can call 9125999708.
